details: All 15 E2E tests for admin login passed successfully. Tests verify: admin user creation, password validation, token-based authentication, API endpoint access, dashboard metrics endpoint availability, and admin-specific endpoint access.

user_creation.description: Verify admin user is created with correct properties

authentication.description: Verify login endpoint and token generation

api_access.description: Verify authenticated requests work and admin can access protected endpoints

infrastructure.description: Verify infrastructure setup for E2E testing

endpoints_tested: /api/accounts/me/ - User profile endpoint with token auth
notes: Admin user created with is_staff=True, is_superuser=True
Login endpoint at /api/accounts/login/ returns response with format {success: bool, data: {token, user}}
Token authentication uses 'Token <token>' format in Authorization header
All 5 login attempts within rate limit (5/minute per IP)
Tests verify both user creation and API access in single test suite
